titles: An exposicyon of the .xv. psalme made by mayster Erasmus of Rotherdame in whiche is full purely declared the pure and clene behauoure that ought to be in the pure churche of Chryst which is the multytude of all trewe chrysten people
author: Erasmus, Desiderius, d. 1536.
notes: Imperfect; lacks leaves J1, J5 and all after J8.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
keywords: Bible. --  O.T. --  Psalms --  Criticism, interpretation, etc. --  Early works to 1800.
